content: योग्यता {@--1@} Ability, capability; न युद्धयोग्यतामस्य पश्यामि सह राक्षसैः <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--2@} Fitness, propriety. {@--3@} Appropriateness. {@--4@} (In Nyāya <ab>phil.</ab>) Fitness or compatibility of sense, the absence of absurdity in the mutual connection of the things signified by the words; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} in अग्निना सिंचति there is no योग्यता; it is thus defined: --एकपदार्थेऽपरपदार्थसंसर्गो योग्यता <ls>Tarka K.</ls>; or पदार्थानां परस्परसंबंधे बाधाभावः <ls>S. D. 2.</ls>
